features: Experience Natural Hemp Seed Oil: Helps soothe inflammation, and calm atopic dermatitis, the benefits of hemp seed oil are limitless. Rich in omega-6 and omega-3 fatty acids, you will experience your skin like never before.

A Fresh and Light Fragrance: Our moisturizer is naturally scented, providing a crisp, clean aroma. Without any harsh chemicals found in other skin creams, this scent leaves behind no residue, and won’t irritate your skin.

Dramatic Skin Hydration: With shea butter and ginseng to help reduce any redness, your skin will remain hydrated through anything. Whether you have winter dryness, flaking, or dry hands and feet, this body cream will help keep skin nourished and soft.

Protect Your Skin: Hempz herbal cream is made with Vitamins A, C, and E, which will help protect your skin from natural and environmentally triggered oxidants. Your skin will look and feel healthier with one of these intense conditioning lotions.
body.description: Hempz Original Herbal Body Moisturizer is enriched with 100% Pure Organic Hemp Seed Oil and blended with natural extracts to provide dramatic skin hydration and nourishment to help improve the health and condition of skin. Hemp Seed Oil is one of nature's richest sources of Essential Fatty Acids and Key Amino Acids containing natural proteins, vitamins, antioxidants, and minerals, vital for healthy skin conditioning. Paraben Free. Gluten Free. 100% Vegan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product but this particular fragrance isn't my favorite
reviews.reviewText: I bought this lotion primarily because I heard that it repels mosquitoes! And I can definitely say that if you apply it liberally on all your skin, that is an accurate statement (at least for me). Mosquitoes usually bite me like crazy and when I wear this, I don't get hardly any and many times none at all. If they do bite, it's usually on the spots I didn't get applied well. The lotion is also moisturizing and easy to spread. It doesn't feel greasy. This particular scent is ok, but I'm not a big fan of it overall so will probably choose a different one next time. Love the product overall though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizer from heaven
reviews.reviewText: Love it , it works all day and smells delicious….

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hands down best around
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been a faithful user of this lotion, I bet for a decade or longer. It goes on smoothly, not oily. It’s very moisturizing and the original scent is my favorite, always has been. Makes a great gift for a friend or yourself. Amazon usually has the best price on this particular lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well and has a pleasant smell
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this as a gift for my wife and she loves it. It seems to keep her skin soft and smooth especially during the colder months. I like the pleasant aroma!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look no further
reviews.reviewText: This is it. The only lotion you will ever want or need. It's everything I want in a lotion. Smells amazing, actually makes my skin feel soft and hydrated. Seeps in fast and doesn't sit on top of skin. I love it. Will never buy any other brand

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells SO good!
reviews.reviewText: This lotion smells so good! Love the light banana fragrance and it doesn't bother my sensitive skin either and doesn't give me a headache. I will never buy any other brand.
